info.headline: Red Flag Warning issued July 7 at 8:56AM AKDT until July 7 at 10:00PM AKDT by NWS Fairbanks AK
info.description:
The National Weather Service in Fairbanks has issued a Red Flag Warning for lightning, which is in effect from noon today to 10 PM AKDT this evening.
* AFFECTED AREA...South Slopes Of The Eastern Brooks Range and Yukon Flats west of Fort Yukon to Arctic Village.
* TIMING...From noon today to 10 PM AKDT this evening.
* THUNDERSTORM COVERAGE INDEX...4, scattered.
* WINDS...Southwest 5 to 10 mph. Stronger gusts up to 35 mph are possible near thunderstorms.
* HUMIDITY...As low as 29 percent.
* TEMPERATURES...Highs in the mid 80s.
* IMPACTS...Numerous wet thunderstorms across the interior will bring frequent lightning strikes and gusty winds.
info.instruction:
A Red Flag Warning means that conditions are occurring or will occur which could lead to the development of large and dangerous fires. It is directed toward fire agencies, and through them, to the public.
Please advise the appropriate officials or fire crews in the field of this Red Flag Warning.

parameter.value: RED FLAG WARNING IN EFFECT FROM NOON TODAY TO 10 PM AKDT THIS EVENING FOR LIGHTNING

area.areaDesc: South Slopes Of The Eastern Brooks Range; Yukon Flats
